website_summaries.verdict: A nice hybrid bike by the brand with a few frustrating issues. In spite of them, it's a close contender for Best of the Best in terms of design and price.
pros: Sleek styling, easy on and off step-through design, and a lightweight build are the hallmarks of this Diamondback bike that is also capable of 21 speeds
cons: Assembly of the gear unit can be tricky
The pedals have been reported to rub against the front wheels on sharp turns

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is soooooo nice! It's well built, it looks awesome, rides smooth, shifts smooth, has quality components, the seat is comfortable, and the seat, and front and back wheels are quick release! The tires are a cross between mountain bike tires and road tires so they are very versatile. Very nice bike and I am so happy with my purchase. I highly recommend this bike to anyone. Oh, also, you sit more upright which is not hard on the back at all, and the grips are nice and cushy on your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great bike! Diamondback is a quality product and this ladies bike is no exception.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! Diamondback is a quality product and this ladies bike is no exception. We bought the men's version last year (seen in photo) and have been very pleased with the quality and performance. The seat and handlebars adjust so you can get the right fit for about anyone. We live where we can ride down state park trails and I have not had any trouble going down the dirt and gravel paths. Shifting is smooth (as long as you shift before putting any weight into it), and assembly was done in under 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: PPT Guru

customer_reviews.title: my new bike
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this bike. Perfect for me. After trying over 50 other bikes at least, in every kind of store I could, from big chains to small bike shops. I found this great bike for myself on amazon. The price was so much more reasonable than anywhere else I had been for what I needed to be comfortable and a perfect fit. It's a pleasure to ride which makes me ride often.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: Great bike value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice quality bicycle for the price. Very comfortable and rides well. I had a professional bike guy put mine together, who adjusted everything and tested all the gears and lines out for me. I think this was a very good purchase. I had been wanting a bike for a long time as I no longer ride my road bike. For those wondering about the size, I am 5'4" and the small is almost too big for me. The size that is online is quite accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Marla A. Le Blanc

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Took about two hours to assemble and the bike is terrific. I'm in my 80s and needed a step through and this fills the bill. Works smoothly and the gears shift perfectly. Ordered a second smaller one one for my wife after she saw how easy it was to mount without throwing a leg over the seat and running the risk of falling down.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a bike in 30 years. Shopped at every store I could find bikes, researched them on line and got bike owners opinions. My sister, dad, 2 nephews have Diamonback and love them. I thought they were out of my price range. Found this one on Amazon, read the great reviews and could not believe the price! Ordered it and it came within a week. My husband and I put it together in about an hour to an hour and a half. If you follow the directions it goes together easily. I am so happy with this bike! You are definitely tall when on this bike. It rides so nice and looks great! LOVE IT !!!
customer_reviews.author: Cold Feet

customer_reviews.title: Quality bike
customer_reviews.text: This is smooth riding for a fraction of what a high end bike costs. We had a professional shop put it together for about $60, well worth it. The bike shifts nicely. It is comfortable on rocky pavement. The seat is a lot better than most that I have tried. Definitely enjoying my bike!
customer_reviews.author: MelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike, my wife loves it. We assembled it last night. My advice would be if you've never messed around with bikes and their parts to have a bike shop assemble. It took us about an hour and while not difficult for a first timer it would be tough. Definitely a 2 person job. It's good quality. The only other hybrid I found that was like this was almost $200 more.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Poirier

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I can't say this was easy to assemble as I took it to a bike shop and paid nearly as much for assembly as I did for the bike. The bike is great, but I ordered based on the size chart and the small seems too small and I'm only 5'5". And the seat keeps sliding down, but that's likely due to the expensive assembly versus product defect. Very nice bike and happy with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amberzon

customer_reviews.title: ON THE ROAD AGAIN.......
customer_reviews.text: A very comfortable bicycle, very smooth, easy on the knees, comfortable seat and I love the way you change gears. It's like a Cadillac compared to the Schwinn I have. I thought the price was right too with free delivery to Prime members. No complaints, I am very happy with my purchase, no regrets!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Holmstrom

customer_reviews.title: Good Bike
customer_reviews.text: My husband was able to put this bike together relatively easily (all part of my Mother's Day gift) and we took it out for a bike ride this last week. It's a nice little bike - not super fancy, but good for riding just for fun. I wouldn't recommend it for serious mountain biking or long commutes. I do wish that it had a built-in kickstand, but that can be added on later.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: My wife really likes this bike. It seems to be very well made, is not too heavy and she can sit upright with no back strain. Seat is very comfortable too. It was way cheaper here than in local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: This bike is very comfortable to ride
customer_reviews.text: This bike is very comfortable to ride. The quick release is very hard to deal with unless you have extremely strong man hands. It's light weight and rides very smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Brownm

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bike I am 5" 3 and I can ride comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SARAH brumbalow

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike, assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. Love it. But be warned, unless you are an expert, you'll need to take it to a bike shop for all the assembling. I'm pretty handy, and I spent a few hours on it before I gave up. My bike shop did the assembly in less than 30 minutes for about $35. Just be mindful of that. Overall, it's a great bike - nice looking, and comfortable for neighborhood rides and longer rides on the greenway.
customer_reviews.author: "jaloni"

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase. Bike does take some knowledge to put together and adjust. If you're not handy, you may need to take it to a bike shop or be ready to watch some Youtube videos. As others have mentioned, instructions are not great, but that saying, it's hard to beat the price and very happy with the quality considering the price. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality for the range of price
customer_reviews.text: Only a couple of things I had to adjust. Very good quality for the range of price. Already bought a mans Diamond a couple of years ago. Sent it to the shop after putting it together. Adjustment cost was $70. He didn't do the best of job on it, but it's ok. But this womans bike...92% perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ole 45 mag

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Great for the casual bike rider or rider just getting started.
customer_reviews.author: bruce pray

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Nice, simple bicycle. No real complaints about it except that the seat to frame is a bit short (so that when you stand up, the handle bars are right at your chest). Shifters are ok and seem to shift smoothly. Shimano parts are a plus. The seat is semi-comfortable - I may change it out eventually as it does seem to rock a little bit when riding. For the price point, I think this is a nice ride :)
customer_reviews.author: A. Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Helps the back - great fit!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a bike to tool around town and take on basic gravel trails then this is it. What's amazing about this bike is it has so many gears - more than some racing type bikes. You can sit up and this eliminates the pressure and pain on arms, shoulders, neck and back. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: PACE

customer_reviews.title: ... & 1st ever bike I'm 5'4" this is a perfect fit for me👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: ❤️❤️❤️ My new & 1st ever bike I'm 5'4" this is a perfect fit for me👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Andre  Rossouw

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike !Just wish the tires were a bit bigger. I was confused about that when I ordered but apparently they are the skinny tires. Don't think you can change to a bigger tire either. Still all in all..I love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: K. Y. Jeffers

customer_reviews.title: Bike great/inner tubes not.
customer_reviews.text: Bike is great. Assembly wasn’t difficult, but took some time. Was glad I’m familiar with bike brake systems—setting up and adjusting the front brakes took a little time and finesse. Total assembly/adjustment took about 3hours. Main problem was that both inner tubes burst/spent $20 buying new ones to replace them. One popped (loud BANG!) as we inflated it the first time—wasn’t even 30 lbs of pressure. The other popped (same loud BANG!) after my wife rode it about 30 feet—had only 50lbs lbs of pressure—the low end of what the tires are rated for). Installed new tubes from local bike shop—rolling great now.
customer_reviews.author: Greg K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike for cruising the neighborhood!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bike, the size we ordered (small) fit her perfectly. The bike was very easy to put together as the instructions were very clear and most tools were provided. The bike is very well made and the shifters work smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Bob McN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike. ordered and brought to the local bike shop for assembly
customer_reviews.author: tmbc

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hybrid bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hybrid bike, half cruiser, half rode bike. It is a beautiful bike and operates perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sundog18

customer_reviews.title: Great ride. Good upright posture.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the most smooth riding bike. I never expected it to ride so nice. I'm 55 with back issues and was afraid of riding til now. I'm leaving for a trip soon and the bike is coming with me.
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Go with this one
customer_reviews.text: Excellent riding bike, put together in about an hour and Jenns Bikes got me the right reflector kit in a week. Excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Long Island IcedT

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BIKE BUT NO KICKSTAND
customer_reviews.text: I'M FIRST TIME BIKE BUYER BUT MY WIFE REALLY HAPPY WITH THIS BIKE EASY ASSEMBLY TAKE ME 1 HOUR FROM UNBOXING TO FIRST RIDE. 4 STAR BECAUSE IT CAME WITH OUT KICKSTAND AND TOOLS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: IURI CATASHOV

customer_reviews.title: Quality of bike is good as far as frame
customer_reviews.text: Quality of bike is good as far as frame, components. However the seat is absolutely terrible. A quality seat is not that expensive. Considering your target audience are women, for this product, Diamondback completely missed it on this one issue. This is showing complete disrespect for women since they actually do need a feminine seat. Selling product is not near as important as doing what is right for the customer. Having to purchase another seat is not customer friendly. Provide a seat specifically for women, then I will change the review.
customer_reviews.author: JRC7

customer_reviews.title: it is very pretty. My husband had it put together and ready ...
customer_reviews.text: Received my bicycle today, it is very pretty. My husband had it put together and ready in less than 30 minutes. He is good at mechanics. The seat is very cushy and I love the low passtruth. Will try it out tomorrow, will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Lupe Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Super comfortable seat and smooth ride. Tried many bikes in the store but none had this beat. I feel very stable on this bike.
customer_reviews.author: kristinute

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and smooth ride
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bike, easy to use and smooth ride. I use it occasionally, on weekends and at camp grounds. Love the color! I also attached a child trailer to it with a separate piece. My toddler love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor packaging; obviously damaged/scratched but described as new or close to new.
customer_reviews.text: Product and packaging was damaged. Original packaging included, but manufacturer doesn't package product well. Zip tie at front of bike was so tight that it broke the brake cable; there were scratches on the frame. The edges of the forks broke through the outer box. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice bike! It arrived damaged but Amazon resolved the issues and the bike is great!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. Needs adjustment on the derailer. However, she loves this bike!
customer_reviews.author: JUAN C RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable well made bike
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable well made bike. The gears are top of the line. The only thing I don't like is the seat... it's not as comfortable as my old diamond back bike seat which is cloth and more cushy.
customer_reviews.author: Hnsign

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bike
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bike! Seat is super comfortable and the suspension glides over the bumps. I rise 24 miles a day to and from work on a refurbished train (now bike) trail. This bike rides perfectly/
customer_reviews.author: C. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the beach or if you want leisurely ride around town. The seat is extremely comfortable and the gears change smoothly. I would recommend this bike for a relaxed ride.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bike for me to ride into town or on simple bike trails. My husband was able to assemble it at home in 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: VictoriaJ

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Super easy to ride. Not hard on your knees at all. Feels very comfortable !!!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Nix

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, and easy access for her to get on ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. We are older , I’m 54 and both own diamondback bikes. These are well made, comfortable , and easy access for her to get on and off. Best bikes I’ve ever own
customer_reviews.author: Ogden Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality hybrid bike
customer_reviews.text: 5' 3" wife loves it. She finds it comfortable, safe and attractive. Riding more frequently since we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: drbubo

customer_reviews.title: I love my new bike
customer_reviews.text: I love my new bike! My husband put it together but it was not as easy as some of the reviews had implied. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Deonna Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Shipping problems
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to assemble, but back wheel probably needs to be looked at by a professional for what looks like a minor product defect and shipping took 10+ days as they sent me the wrong product at first. Good bike so far other than those issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The derailer is not adjusted when delivered
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for assembly are vague at best. Took abou 2 hours. After it was done took it for its first test ride. Shifted the rear derailer 3 times in one block before the derailer went into the spokes and bent to a 90 degree angle. Cost another $150 to have a bike shop replace. Recommend the 75 for assembly.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. Great value for the money to have such a name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mainuh

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: This bike is quality and very easy to put together with minimal, if any adjustments. My girlfriend loves it.
customer_reviews.author: GSW

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Birthday present for my daughter. Easy to put together. I think she will like it.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Guzik

customer_reviews.title: Quality bike at an awesome price
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy assembly and love the purple color. I bought the small frame, it states for riders 5'4 - 5'7. I'm 5'1 but with the adjustable frame and seat, its a comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Y

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So light and easy to ride. My wife adores it!
customer_reviews.author: J. Rebecca Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bike. Gears change with ease. And it’s not too heavy!!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Pickett

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bike but came with scratches. Assembly wasn't too bad! I had a friend who knew bikes put it together for me so we got it done in about 30 mins. I bought a bike stand separately to attach, the only thing that sucks is that it decreased $40 AFTER I had bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Quinoa

customer_reviews.title: love my bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the money. It is very easy to ride shifts great and is very comfortable. Might think about replacing the seat for longer rides.
customer_reviews.author: Harold B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike. Very smooth while riding. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jagan

customer_reviews.title: Bike just purchased
customer_reviews.text: Put the bike together tried to put air in tires and noticed The back tire tube came damaged very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rosie M.

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Good comfort bike with good price. My wife is satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Max Kolesnichenko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bike
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bike. I was looking all over for a new bike that was worth the price. I am 46 and the bike I had was difficult to change the gears and it was heavy, which made riding it difficult on hills, not to mention lifting it on and off my bike carrier. I wanted something light weight and uncomplicated. This bike is light weight, the gears are soooo easy to change and it is comfortable. Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.author: K Rothrock

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ride. Pretty colir too.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. She likes it very mych.
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Zapor

customer_reviews.title: Very well built. Not sure if the gears are ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. Not sure if the gears are shifting correctly though.
customer_reviews.author: Anita L. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Bad - slight bent front derailleur
customer_reviews.text: Bad - slight bent front derailleur. Already taken to bike shop 2 times as chain keeps coming out. Might be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Rajeev K.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but heavy.
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent bike for the price. A little heavy for an aluminum frame and the front fork is very stiff. My wife seems to like it well enough. I may upgrade some of the components to lighten it up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Smithonfire

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got a great price on this bike and so far I am really liking it. I wanted a 'girly' bike as I do not want to throw my leg over a bike and to be honest I am not the most gifted bike rider! I like the light purple color, the comfortable seat and the ease of shifting and braking. As others have commented it does not come with a kickstand for for the price I am okay with that. Will probably augment with some fenders and some kind of 'basket' (dating myself with this term?) in the future.
customer_reviews.author: EY

customer_reviews.title: The front derailleur came unadjusted; it does not switch ...
customer_reviews.text: The front derailleur came unadjusted; it does not switch to second gear and when it is in third gear it touches the chain. It did not include any manuals explaining how to adjust the derailleur. After spending hours was not able to adjust it- will take it to a bike shop...
customer_reviews.author: hb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike easy to get on and off. Well built also doesn't weight that much. It looks awesome, rides smooth, shifts smooth, has quality components, the seat is comfortable. The seat,front and back wheels are quick release! The tires are a cross between mountain bike tires and road tires so they are very versatile. Very nice bike and I am so happy with my purchase. Doesn't come with a kickstand(bought one off Amazon.com). I enjoy riding it all over the bike trails!!
customer_reviews.author: Shon W

customer_reviews.title: This is not my first bike, and it won't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first bike, and it won't be the last. I have had to return it... it is a somewhat smooth bike, but the issues are with the pedals. The pedals in my bike touch the front wheel when I make sharp turn. This is very dangerous and a huge design flaw, I am returning the bike...
customer_reviews.author: A Joern

customer_reviews.title: Love My New Bike.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bike and a lot cheaper on Amazon. Easy to put together. Rides great and lightweight. Love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Dont expect to much!
customer_reviews.text: Showed up with wrong reflectors and a slit in the inner tube in back tire and nothing was ever done to correct this issue.
customer_reviews.author: KEITH L.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife drives this super bicycle the hole day , so I have to do the kitchen .....
customer_reviews.author: Eckhard Beck-Broichsitter

customer_reviews.title: Great bike - once you have all the pieces.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is great. Perfect height for my 5'0" daughter. Unfortunately, it was missing some parts for the brake assembly from the box or it would be five stars. Wasn't happy to discover that omission. The parts need to be secured better in the box! But, the bike itself is excellent quality, easy for her to maneuver, and looks fab. My daughter loves it!! Just need to buy a kick stand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Corwin

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for all.
customer_reviews.text: Superb bicycle. No pictures do justice for the color of this bike. it is not pink or light purple. It's a shade of purple that not even diamondback's own site can capture. You really do need to see it for yourself. Super lightweight, easy to ride for male or female, and feels like a motorcycle with the high handles.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased the bike and the next day the price was ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the bike and the next day the price was reduced by $30 the box was all torn up when received and the bike was scratched!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Varriale

customer_reviews.title: hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: terrible to put together. i am not even sure if i did it right and my front wheel hits my feet when i turn.
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: Great value and workmanship. Runs very smoothly. Tires are not very good on loose gravel. Slippery.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding fit and quality. Great value for the money spent. Assembly went smoothly. Be sure to have the right tools. Retighten and adjust everything.
customer_reviews.author: Unanimouse

customer_reviews.title: RUST
customer_reviews.text: After a drive in the rain with the bike on the roof, the bike is a rust bucket and will be trashed. Don't buy this bike if it rains where you live.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Need to have a PhD in bike assembly for this product
customer_reviews.text: The information about this product is incredibly misleading. I have a masters and a PhD in engineering, and after spending 5 hours, I still haven't been able to assemble the bike. The instructions are in a very techie language and impossible to understand by someone who's not an expert in bike assembly. Even worse, the company has no contact phone number and the only way of communicating with them is a contact form where their answer to your problems is to go to a local bike dealer, spend your own money, and have them assemble it. Horrible experience and I definitely do not recommend this product and store.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Barrios

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Poorly made. Try riding it once and it fell apart. Parts were made of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Landwehr

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install ; needed lots of fine tuning . Wheels are cheap , hit one small pot hole and had to get wheel trued. Bike rides well though my wife says
customer_reviews.author: Stinsonator

product_meta.title: Diamondback Bicycles 2016 Women's Vital 2 Complete Hybrid Bike
product_meta.description: If you want to enjoy some fresh air, have a bit of fun, and gain a little fitness, the vital 2 is the perfect tool for the job. The aluminum frame is lightweight and easy to handle, and its step through design makes getting on and off the bike a breeze. Once you're riding, every feature of this bike is aimed at enhancing your comfort. Women's-specific touch points, an adjustable stem, and confidence-inspiring handling make this a joy on the bike path. A suspension fork and seat post add an extra level of cushioning, letting you pay attention to the scenery. Shimano's 21-speed drivetrain has an extended low end, meaning there's no hill you can't casually spin up. Finished off in a fun Purple, this is a bike that begs to be ridden.
feature_bullets: 6061-T6 aluminum frame with Sport Hybrid Geometry for more upright pedaling position is built to last
Step through frame design makes getting on and off the bike a breeze
Suspension fork and seat post for added cushioning
Shimano 21-speed drivetrain provides wide range of gears
700c road wheels are efficient and smooth rolling

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
